ygData.subject: Re: New smith stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I met someone today who said his brother in law was able to get banded gauntlets somehow for this quest.  However this horses ass refused to tell me how to go
ygData.messageBody:
I met someone today who said his brother in law was able to get banded
gauntlets somehow for this quest. However this horses ass refused to tell
me how to go about it (at the same time auctioning for someone to sell him
banded gauntlets). The sheer number of people who keep asking about them
makes me believe they are implemented and work but the people who know ain't
talking so as to corner the market with the shamans.

> Date: Thu, 14 Oct 1999 12:44:46 +0200
> From: nicolas.miskic@...
> Subject: Re: New smith stuff
>
> thank you for info. now a few question because i dont know this
> zone is it a new npc vendor or an old one with new stuff to sell
> ? that could be helpfull
> because we need to find the vendor of the banded gantlet mold.
> this item surely exist because its used for the new shaman armor
> quest. 8)
> i have petition a gm to know if this mold have been implemented he
> simply reply me that there are several problem with the new patch
> and that he don t know it this item is already findable in the game.
